channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-7087] Remove lineage information after query completion
item.description: Lineage information is stacked in session and is not cleared before the session is closed. That also makes redundant lineage logs in q.out files for all of the queries after any inserts, which should be available only for insert queries.
item.summary: Remove lineage information after query completion

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Attaches sources only first. This makes huge diff file.

In DataContainer.toString() you may want to add delimiter between table name and partition values. part.getDbName() + "." + part.getTableName() + "@" + part.getValues() (or any other delimiter of your choice)

Other than look goods to me.
ashutoshc Thanks for a quick review. I'll update the patch when HIVE-7095 is resolved.
navis Hive QA didnt run because patch is not appropriately named. Was that intentional ?
Ran test by manual. I've added 'a' for meaning that it contains a part of whole diff. But didn't know Hive QA accepts only numeric values, and I will take that in mind.
You want to upload full diff with correct file name, so Hive QA gets to run on it.

Overall: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12646832/HIVE-7087.3.patch.txt

ashutoshc Oops, this needs one more diff file. I'm on it.
Thanks, Navis. I updated all other .q.out files where reported by Hive QA but missed tez files.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
